chapter.title: Download
chapter.para: The official JBoss Messaging project page is http://www.jboss.org/jbossmessaging/.

section.title: Software Download
section.para: The download location is the JBoss Labs Messaging Project download zone: http://www.jboss.org/jbossmessaging/downloads/
